TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CGPDFDictionary extends System.Object implements class MonoTouch.ObjCRuntime.INativeObject

Docs.remarks: Dictionaries are used extensively in the PDF file format. Instances of this class represent dictionaries in your documents and the methods in this class can be used to look up the values in the dictionary or iterate over all of the elements of it.

MemberSignature.Value: public CGPDFDictionary (IntPtr handle);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(native int handle) cil managed

Docs.summary: A constructor used when creating managed representations of unmanaged objects.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Apply (Action<string,MonoTouch.CoreGraphics.CGPDFObject> callback);
.method public hidebysig instance void Apply(class System.Action`2<string, class MonoTouch.CoreGraphics.CGPDFObject> callback) cil managed
public void Apply (Action<string,object> callback);
.method public hidebysig instance void Apply(class System.Action`2<string, object> callback) cil managed

Docs.param: The method or lambda to be invoked for each element in the dictionary.
Docs.summary: Iterates over all the elements in the dictionary, invoking the provided callback method for each element.

remarks.para: This method is used to iterate over all of the elements in the dictionary without having to know the names of the keys in the dictionary.

The callback is invoked with the name of the dictionary key and an boxed object. The type of the boxed object in the callback is one of: null value, boolean, int, float, string, CGPDFArray, CGPDFDictionary or CGPDFStream.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Count { get; }
.property instance int32 Count

Docs.summary: The number of items on this dictionary.
Docs.remarks: You can iterate over the dictionary elements by using the Apply method.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool GetArray (string key, out MonoTouch.CoreGraphics.CGPDFArray array);
.method public hidebysig instance bool GetArray(string key, class MonoTouch.CoreGraphics.CGPDFArray array) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the element to get out of the dictionary.
The array, if the function returns true.
Docs.summary: Looks up an array value by name on the dictionary.
Docs.returns: true if the value was found on the dictionary and the out parameter set to the value. If the value is false, the result of the out parameter is undefined.
